channel.title: CVE Feed for chrony -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for chrony -- all products

item.title: CVE-2015-1853|2024-08-06T04:54:16.335Z -- chrony -- chrony
item.description: chrony before 1.31.1 does not properly protect state variables in authenticated symmetric NTP associations, which allows remote attackers with knowledge of NTP peering to cause a denial of service (inability to synchronize) via random timestamps in crafted NTP data packets.

item.title: CVE-2014-0021|2024-08-06T08:58:26.538Z -- chrony -- chrony
item.description: Chrony before 1.29.1 has traffic amplification in cmdmon protocol
